post.body: sorry to hear that. I hope 2009 is a much better year for you.
Won a single game of wii bowling with a score of 179. I only do well on cp games, 360 & wii are beyond my skill level. G'night!
Playing lady gaga's just dance on the uke, badly.
I'm the equivalent of a foot in the band. I press the pedal with my hand when I see the gold bar appear on the drums. Rock on!
I'm just not a musical person which is why I'm not playing rock band on the 360.
I love awkward holiday gatherings, @ one right now & want the food to be served so there's no pressure to talk
Watching hellboy 2
brother is bashing each of the kardashian sisters, so proud
''stop rubbing on my roof, you're terrorising my gingerbread house!''
''There are so many bi-racial squirrels here!''
Power just went out, taking a shower instead of online shopping.
Merry Christmas and to all a good night. Peace.
Wearing my blue santa sack/stocking while eatting christmas cookies and watching dr. Zhivago
Waking up to house guests and cups of eggnog :) merry christmas everyone!
Cough med kicking in, taking a nap b/for friends arrive. I hope I can see benjamin button or valkeri today
Finally finished with the gingerbread house! Its so adorable! I took so many pics on my phone.
Starting project gingerbread house :)
Merry Christmas everyone! I really enjoyed church, I think I'll try to go next year too :)
Getting ready for church, in this outfit I'm going to be freezing!
Oh Gigi, when did your sparkle turn to fire, warmth become desire?
